fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the Spamhaus server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: The username used to access the Spamhaus server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: The Password used to access the Spamhaus server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description:
Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.
 By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves list of indicators from the Spamhaus feed based on the dataset, mode, ipaddress, and other input parameter you have specified.
operations.title: Fetch Indicators

parameters.title: DataSet
parameters.description: Identifies the dataset where the search can be performed
parameters.name: dataset

parameters.title: Process response as
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: The Feed Data can either be returned as a JSON, or Created as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.description: The Feed Data can either be returned as a JSON, or Created as Feed Records in FortiSOAR

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this value is set as 10.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of results, per page, that this operation should return. By default, this value is set as 10.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Starting datetime from when you want to retrieve indicators from Spamhaus Feed. Note: If the timezone information is not specified then the Spamhaus Feed timezone considered for retrieving the indicators.
parameters.tooltip: Starting date time. Consider it as the Spamhaus timezone if the timezone info is not specified.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Ending datetime till when you want to retrieve indicators from Spamhaus. Note: If the timezone information is not specified then the Spamhaus Feed timezone considered for retrieving the indicators.
parameters.tooltip: Ending date time. Consider it as the Spamhaus timezone if the timezone info is not specified.
